description: Grants the user the ability to transform into a turtle and turtle-hybrid form, providing a diamond-hard protective shell and enhanced defensive capabilities.

users.circumstances: Pekoms ate this fruit at an unknown time before his debut, making him the only known mink to possess Devil Fruit powers.

abilityReveals.description: User transforms into a full turtle or turtle-hybrid form, gaining a protective shell described as being hard as diamond.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Pekoms uses this transformation to defend against Caribou's gatling gun attack, emerging completely unscathed.

abilityReveals.description: The turtle shell provides exceptional defensive protection, described as being as hard as diamond and capable of blocking firearms.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Pekoms blocks Caribou's gatling gun fire without taking any damage while in turtle form.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Potentially vulnerable when not in defensive turtle form

strengths.strength: Exceptional defensive capabilities with diamond-hard shell
strengths.description: The turtle shell provides near-impenetrable defense against conventional attacks.

strengths.strength: Allows mink to retain abilities while using Devil Fruit powers
strengths.description: Pekoms is able to combine his natural mink abilities with Devil Fruit powers.
